name: random-forest
description: Random Forest with WebAssembly and WebWorkers

scripts.clean: rimraf wrapper && rimraf dist && rimraf wasm
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir wrapper && mkdir dist && mkdir wasm
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run build-native && npm run prepare-wasm && npm run build-base && npm run build-worker && npm run prepare-worker && npm run build-async && npm run build-example-base && npm run build-example-async
scripts.prepublish: rimraf dist && rimraf wasm && rimraf example/bundle

author: Anton Zemlyansky
